text: Allah ek aur misal deta hai, do aadmi hain ek gunga behra hai, koi kaam nahin kar sakta, apne aaqa par bojh bana hua hai, jidhar bhi woh usey bheje koi bhala kaam ussey ban na aaye, dusra shaks aisa hai ke insaaf ka hukum deta hai aur khud raah e raast par qayam hai, batao kya yeh dono yaksan hain
